title: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The 'BidiUtil' class in the 'org.eclipse.swt.internal' package has a line of code that uses 'Class.forName()' with the argument 'BidiUtil.class'. This code is present in the win32 version of the 'BidiUtil' class.
SR: To resolve this issue, change the line above to: 'static Callback callback = new Callback(new BidiUtil().getClass(), "windowProc", 4);'. This modification should have the same functionality as the original code.
